alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Laurens, central Dodge, Telfair and southwestern Wheeler Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Achord, or 7 miles west of McRae, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Helena, Lumber City, Milan, Scotland, Chauncey, Jacksonville, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Jay Bird Springs, China Hill, Achord, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Godwinsville, and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
